entries.title: Exactly Why and How Republicans Hate Ilhan Omar
entries.description:
It has literally nothing to do with antisemitism.

entries.title: Tema Okun on Her Mythical Paper on White Supremacy
entries.description:
Tema Okun, the author of a famous (or infamous?) paper on white supremacy, speaks out decades later.

entries.title: White House-Linked Venture Capital Fund Boasts China War Would Be Great for Business
entries.description:
A representative from America’s Frontier Fund said that a “kinetic event” in the Pacific would be very good for its bottom line.

The post White House-Linked Venture Capital Fund Boasts China War Would Be Great for Business appeared first on The Intercept.

entries.title: Big Business’ Plan to Block Biden’s Ban on Noncompete Agreements
entries.description:

entries.title: Reproductive Rights Activists Charged Under Law Intended to Protect Abortion Clinics
entries.description:
The Justice Department is calling graffiti on anti-abortion centers a threat to “reproductive health services facilities.”

The post Reproductive Rights Activists Charged Under Law Intended to Protect Abortion Clinics appeared first on The Intercept.
